context_of_use: This use case allows admins to monitor and update inventory levels to prevent stockouts.
stakeholders_and_interests: admin: Control inventory levels to ensure product availability.
description: Enable admins to monitor and update inventory levels to prevent stockouts.
preconditions: Admin has access to inventory management features.
assumptions: Admin has the necessary permissions to manage inventory.
requirements_met: The system shall allow admins to manage inventory levels.
outstanding_issues: Clarification on the specific inventory management features required.
main_flow: 1. Admin initiates inventory management → System displays current inventory levels.
2. Admin updates inventory levels → System saves the updated inventory levels.
3. Admin confirms changes → System displays a success message.
exception_flows: EF-1 (from Step 1): If the admin is not authenticated, the system displays an error message and denies access.
